content: @John Baez - Thanks for the info! I look forward to reading the paper when it's ready :)
so I don't get it, "let's keep it this way" how? Am I allowed to have my stream "practice: computing dialectica" or not? If yes, I will move/delete my welcoming message.

I think he meant yes, you should have a stream "practice: computing dialectica". That's the only way your group can have lots of different conversations ("topics") in that stream, and find them rather easily.
At least this is my opinion... and I'm a moderator too!
